hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Bara' ibn Azib: A maternal uncle of mine called AbuBurdah sacrificed before the prayer (for 'Id). The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Your goat is meant for flesh. He said: Messenger of Allah, I have a domestic kid with me. He said: Sacrifice it, but it is not valid for any man other than you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجُوزُ مِنَ السِّنِّ فِي الضَّحَايَا
chapter.eng-name: What Is Allowed Regarding Age For The Udhiyyah (Sacrifice)
